meanings.definition: A person who is engaged in the practice of agriculture.
meanings.sent1: The hardworking agriculturists planted seeds in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The local agriculturists harvest fresh vegetables every summer.
meanings.sent3: The agriculturists had a corny joke about their favorite farming tools.
meanings.sent4: In the field of life, we are all agriculturists, sowing seeds of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The diligent agriculturists toiled under the sun, nurturing the land.

meanings.definition: Those who cultivate land and raise crops for food and other products.
meanings.sent1: Many agriculturists work tirelessly to grow crops for the community.
meanings.sent2: The group of skilled agriculturists managed a successful vineyard.
meanings.sent3: The agriculturists organized a fun farm festival for the town.
meanings.sent4: The agriculturists were like artists, painting the fields with vibrant produce.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated agriculturists reaped the rewards of their hard work at harvest time.
